lead_paragraph: The Islamic State called the car bombing, in the crowded Mansoura neighborhood, a “martyrdom operation.”

byline.contributor: Nour Youssef reported from Cairo, and Saeed Al-Batati from Al Mukalla, Yemen. Shuaib Almosawa contributed reporting from Sana, Yemen.
byline.original: By NOUR YOUSSEF and SAEED AL-BATATI

headline.print_headline: Scores of Military Recruits Die in Yemen Car Bombing
headline.main: Suicide Attack Kills Scores of Military Recruits in Aden, Yemen

snippet: The Islamic State called the car bombing, in the crowded Mansoura neighborhood, a “martyrdom operation.”...
abstract: Fatal car bombing in Yemen kills 54 military recruits and wounds 67 people near military recruitment center in city of Aden; Islamic State claims responsibility.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
